aka: North America with Simon Reeve (DVD Title)

director.name: 埃里克·凯利·麦克法兰 Eric Kelly McFarland

this_title: The Americas with Simon Reeve Season 1
trans_title: 西蒙·里夫美洲之旅 第一季
North America with Simon Reeve (DVD Title)
introduction: Simon will journey from Alaska to Argentina, from the top to the toe.The first series of The Americas with Simon Reeve (5 x 1 hours, to be broadcast this autumn) sees Simon travel down through North America, from the icy wilderness of Alaska to the tropical heat of Costa Rica.
chinese_title: 西蒙·里夫美洲之旅 第一季
foreign_title: The Americas with Simon Reeve Season 1
